snippet.textDisplay: Confession: FTL really means FUCK THIS LOSS. I've lost more times than I care to remember. One thing that keeps me coming back is the amazing music. Watching your crew simultaneously suffocate and burn to death isn't so bad with a throbbing sick soundtrack to jam to.
snippet.textOriginal: Confession: FTL really means FUCK THIS LOSS. I've lost more times than I care to remember. One thing that keeps me coming back is the amazing music. Watching your crew simultaneously suffocate and burn to death isn't so bad with a throbbing sick soundtrack to jam to.

snippet.textDisplay: the bassline is the sound of the players all simultaneously smashing their heads against a wall in frustration

snippet.textDisplay: fun game. my only complaint is that the Bad Guys are the Rebels, opposite of Star Wars. when usually you want to root for the Rebels because they are the underdogs, but here they are unstoppable

snippet.textDisplay: good points!
snippet.textOriginal: good points!

snippet.textDisplay: That's actually a point in it's favor, it's become so rare that the Enforcers of Law are the Underdogs, but that's what's going on in this game, and if you look into the Red Army (which was an uprising by the Bolsheviks that became a feared ruling power in Russia from 1917 until 1991, later adapting the Soviet Army name) it shows just how Dangerous that sort of thing can be. I highly recommend watching Dr Chivago (it's an older but incredibly well-aged film) as it delves with the whole, rebels can be just as dangerous as ruling authorities or royalties.
snippet.textOriginal: That's actually a point in it's favor, it's become so rare that the Enforcers of Law are the Underdogs, but that's what's going on in this game, and if you look into the Red Army (which was an uprising by the Bolsheviks that became a feared ruling power in Russia from 1917 until 1991, later adapting the Soviet Army name) it shows just how Dangerous that sort of thing can be. I highly recommend watching Dr Chivago (it's an older but incredibly well-aged film) as it delves with the whole, rebels can be just as dangerous as ruling authorities or royalties.

snippet.textDisplay: That's the reality of thing. Depend on the case, a rebel isn't always the one that fight for the good of everyone.

snippet.textDisplay: I played this game for over 100 hours, got really tired of the music after like 40 hours but then I just muted the music and started listening to other music while i played instead. This track is awesome though, but you only hear it like 5% of the time you're playing.
snippet.textOriginal: I played this game for over 100 hours, got really tired of the music after like 40 hours but then I just muted the music and started listening to other music while i played instead. This track is awesome though, but you only hear it like 5% of the time you're playing.

snippet.textDisplay: Confession: I never could beat this final battle. Everytime, I found it way too overwhelming. I'm far from the best at playing roguelikes so I attribute it to my lack of skill and patience at developing it. One thing's for sure, FTL has awesome music and this theme is no exception.
snippet.textOriginal: Confession: I never could beat this final battle. Everytime, I found it way too overwhelming. I'm far from the best at playing roguelikes so I attribute it to my lack of skill and patience at developing it. One thing's for sure, FTL has awesome music and this theme is no exception.

snippet.textDisplay: It's also possible to just brute force the thing, you'll need 4 burst lasers or equivalent on standard  and  adv. there are even more good options that work great with hacking but the strat of killing 3/4 gunners in phase one and leaving just that last gunner alive in phase two is the easiest one and most reliable because hacking and teleport are easy to get.
snippet.textOriginal: It's also possible to just brute force the thing, you'll need 4 burst lasers or equivalent on standard  and  adv. there are even more good options that work great with hacking but the strat of killing 3/4 gunners in phase one and leaving just that last gunner alive in phase two is the easiest one and most reliable because hacking and teleport are easy to get.

snippet.textDisplay: boarding party and leaving the left middle gun room alive so the AI doesn't take over and pray to God you dont get RNG screwed
snippet.textOriginal: boarding party and leaving the left middle gun room alive so the AI doesn't take over and pray to God you dont get RNG screwed

snippet.textDisplay: My best bet was to aim for a good boarding party. The three gunning rooms on the final boss are not connected to the rest of the ship and so once your boarding party takes out one, they can't repair those systems until the 2nd and 3rd phase of the battle. Then it's just rinse and repeat. It was how I got my only win in the game.
snippet.textOriginal: My best bet was to aim for a good boarding party. The three gunning rooms on the final boss are not connected to the rest of the ship and so once your boarding party takes out one, they can't repair those systems until the 2nd and 3rd phase of the battle. Then it's just rinse and repeat. It was how I got my only win in the game.

snippet.textDisplay: Yeah this battle takes some patience and good RNG. I've always found that investing in a cloaking device really pays off in this fight.
snippet.textOriginal: Yeah this battle takes some patience and good RNG. I've always found that investing in a cloaking device really pays off in this fight.

snippet.textDisplay: Your best strategy is to take out missiles and shields. Then focus on other weapons and getting the engine and piloting systems down. It's not an easy game to beat by any means, but the reward for beating the game, the exhilaration you'll get, it's unmatched. If you ever want tips or anything, check out other people playing the game on youtube, it's definitely a challenge, but well worth it.
snippet.textOriginal: Your best strategy is to take out missiles and shields. Then focus on other weapons and getting the engine and piloting systems down. It's not an easy game to beat by any means, but the reward for beating the game, the exhilaration you'll get, it's unmatched. If you ever want tips or anything, check out other people playing the game on youtube, it's definitely a challenge, but well worth it.
